question: Which nation houses the infamous man-eater Nile crocodile "Gustave"?
explanation: Gustave is a large male man-eater Nile crocodile from Burundi. Unverified reports claim that it killed around 300 people in his 65 years of life. It is mostly seen on the banks of Ruzize river and Lake Tanganyika. Several attempts were made to capture him, all failed. Several unverified reports also claim that he has been killed.
